snippet: Race tainted the sentencing of a murderer in Texas.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Charles J Ogletree Jr rejects as racially motivated the capital punishment sentence for Texas inmate Duane Buck; notes sentence was based on prosecution's expert witness who attributed Buck's 'future dangerousness'  to fact he is black; demands new, fair sentencing hearing for Buck.
lead_paragraph: Race tainted the sentencing of a murderer in Texas.

headline.main: Condemned to Die Because He’s Black
headline.print_headline: Condemned to Die Because He’s Black
